metadata.title: CVE-2020-15114 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In etcd before versions 3.3.23 and 3.4.10, the etcd gateway is a simple TCP proxy to allow for basic service discovery and access. However, it is possible to include the gateway address as an endpoint. This results in a denial of service, since the endpoint can become stuck in a loop of requesting itself until there are no more available file descriptors to accept connections on the gateway.

criterions.comment: etcd package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
